description: In an ongoing series, The NPR Politics Podcast is hitting the road and interviewing 2020 Democratic presidential candidates. This episode Scott Detrow and New Hampshire Public Radio's Lauren Chooljian sit down with former secretary of Housing and Urban Development Juli치n Castro to ask why he's the best pick for president. This series is produced in collaboration with NHPR and Iowa Public Radio.
